narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This was the second pre-license inspection.  The facility is in compliance with the AWA regulations at this time.  The
applicant wishes to be licensed as a Class C exhibitor.
 The appropriate licensing fees will be forwarded to:
USDA APHIS ANIMAL CARE
EASTERN REGIONAL OFFICE
920 MAIN CAMPUS DRIVE, 
SUITE 200
RALEIGH, NC 27606
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A CLASS C LICENSE IS ISSUED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
